messages.content: a highly detailed matte painting of a man on a hill watching a rocket launch in the distance by studio ghibli, makoto shinkai, by artgerm, by wlop, by greg rutkowski, volumetric lighting, octane render, 4 k resolution, trending on artstation, masterpiece | hyperrealism| highly detailed| insanely detailed| intricate| cinematic lighting| depth of field
That's a stunning image! It looks like it could be a scene from a movie.
Il est libre, alors qu'il est prisonnier de ses propres actes ?
